description:
- Harken the light! -
Attacking Karma is a double-edged sword—the party gets increasingly weak due to Karma`s debuffs.
Akira realizes a path to victory and dashes forward with Kamui,
only to be cut down by Karma. Left with no options,
Akira is handed a smartphone by Genma. He prepares to strike...

titles.title: Kami no Hikari, Kami no Honoo
